remarks: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. Variables ` x ` and ` y ` are normally free-variable parameters in the class expression substituted for ` C ` , which can be thought of as ` C ( x , y ) ` .  See comments for ~ abrexex .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
statement:
ab2rexex.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ab2rexex.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
ab2rexex $p |- { z | E. x e. A E. y e. B z = C } e. _V $.
$d A x z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
